question: Can we perform umrah in the months of shawal to 6th Zilhaj even if we do not have an intention to perform haj
answer:
QUESTION
Can we perform umrah in the months of shawal to 6th Zilhaj even if we do not have an intention to perform haj and the farz haj is already performed
ANSWER


Share:
If one has already performed the Fard Hajj, it is permissible to perform
Umrah from Shawwaal until the days of Hajj.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
